1.Property editor can be opened.
Check your DEUtil, we can not make a GroupElementHandle without a Module Handle
I think you should take care of this case if the input is not a muduleHandle. Null is just one possbile type of selected elements
Fixed. GUI must make sure to call GroupElementFactory.newGroupElement(ModuleHandle,List) to get what he needs. Model does all the details to instantiate a right handle with the given parameters.
